scripts.allure:history: mkdir allure-results\history || echo 'history folder already in place...continuing :)' && copy allure-report\history\*.json .\allure-results\history && echo 'Allure trends updated!' && npm run pretest
scripts.allure:make: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.wdio:regression: npm run port:kill && npm run allure:history && npx wdio wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@regression' ; npm run allure:make
scripts.wdio:smoke: npm run port:kill && npm run allure:history && npx wdio wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@smoke' ; npm run allure:make
